# HaderachHage

HaderhachHage @___haderhage

KOSS

Apple Music • Spotify • YouTube • Bandcamp (/Subvert) • Contact

Textiles+Graphics+Sounds+Interiors Engineered by Oluwaseindemi "Shayne" Adigun.

He Began Design and Production in the back of class at Ås Ungdomsskole with Kevin Punnar, Dawit Admassu and Oda Plur under the tags SAWK, sanuwkgi, and svartarmor.


He has since then been an active pursuer of Modelling+TheVisual/Media Arts+Architecture/Design+Photography


His debut musical project “KOSS” (2025) was his first public AV/audio+visual content merger, with the cover being a blend of two media formats; audio being embedded into an image and edited solely using audio effects, such as phaser/flangers and reverb.
Conceptualised + Designed + Shot + Produced through the Summer of 2024 to 2025.
